Try.description: Smart Type Code Completion filters the suggestion list and includes only those types that are applicable to the current context. Press <action="SmartTypeCompletion"> to see the list of suitable ways to complete. Choose the first one by pressing <action="EditorEnter">
Smart Type Code Completion can also suggest a code for return. Press <action="SmartTypeCompletion"> twice to see Lookup menu for return. Choose the first one by pressing <action="EditorEnter">
